firsttime.name: Janus Dunn
firsttime.text:
Yo bro. I'm gonna teach you ins and outs of mining.
See these numbers? You click them and the corresponding block gets destroyed.
Good Luck!

stone.name: Janus Dunn
stone.text: You see this is stone. There is a lot of this crap. You can sell it or something. I'm not the </item:1188085855789776957>. Who even is </item:1188085855789776957>???

ironore.name: Janus Dunn
ironore.text:
Ore of iron! It needs to be smelted or something. Why are you looking at me like that? I'm just mining here sometimes or I'm talking nonsense to the newbies.
I think so...

goldore.name: Janus Dunn
goldore.text:
TREASURE!!!
Oh wait that's just a gold... No one will understand the reference unless I tell you that during mining system creation kolpa forgot to put gold ore texture, so there was the treasure chest texture instead.
What am I even talking about..?

treasure.name: Janus Dunn
treasure.text:
Not bad. Not bad. It's a treasure chest! Just that.
What? You think that I should say something about it? I don't feel like it.

diamondore.name: Janus Dunn
diamondore.text:
Diamonds. Not bad rookie.
It's not like everybody who digs here gets at least one diamond.

byebye.name: Janus Dunn
byebye.text:
Bye!
Come back again here someday or don't. I don't care. I don't work here.

Why am I here in the first place...
